title: Client closed and forced to update in ranked match
body:
Why is this even a thing? My client won't let me login and when i switch to legacy i have to update it in the middle of my ranked match..
Why Riot..

replies.body:
Ouch, sorry to hear this happened in your ranked match. =/

What happened in the first place that caused your client to close? Did you receive a specific error message before it closed out entirely, and if it did, what did it say? A few more details will help me provide you with the right solution.
